channel.title: How do I make an NPC aggresive?
channel.description: Well I'm adding a corporal beast and I want it to be a challenge so I want to make it aggresive but how?

item.title: How do I make an NPC aggresive?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“ballin jr., post:26, topic:262794”]Ok, since no-one knows, here’s how:

Ok,to begin open up your nphandler.java and search for:

//humans

Then make a space between a code that looks like this:

[code]else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1125) {
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 1142;

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 142) {
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 75;[/code]

In between it add:

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == *) { hitDiff = @ + misc.random(%);

* - put the npc’s id here
@ - put the lowest hit that the npc will strike
% - put the highest amount the npc will hit

Save and Compile!

(Rep appreciated)[/quote]

do not ask for rep.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make an NPC aggresive?

item.title: How do I make an NPC aggresive?
item.dc:creator: @_ballin_jr *ballin jr.*
item.description:
@_ballin_jr wrote:

Ok, since no-one knows, here’s how:

Ok,to begin open up your nphandler.java and search for:

//humans

Then make a space between a code that looks like this:

[code]else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1125) {
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 1142;

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 142) {
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 75;[/code]

In between it add:

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == *) { hitDiff = @ + misc.random(%);

* - put the npc’s id here
@ - put the lowest hit that the npc will strike
% - put the highest amount the npc will hit

Save and Compile!

(Rep appreciated)

Read full topic
